Reviews.Title: It really surprised me!
Reviews.Author: Anna LaBruyere
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time researching for a laptop replacement. I liked HP products and found this gem. It had everything I was looking for at a reasonable price. The screen display is unbelievable! I LOVE my screen. Powerful, great processor, lots of storage and user friendly processes. The only drawbacks for me were the shorter than average battery life and, since I wanted a decent-sized screen,it is a little big for carrying around. It is going to be missed if I have to replace it anytime soon. Had this one for almost 3 years!

Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: Amazon Guru
Reviews.Content: This is a very cool laptop that can be updated to Windows 8It has a 2.10 ghz processor which moves at an exceptional speed and the excellency doesn't end there camera is

Reviews.Title: Now I know why it was so cheap
Reviews.Author: REDHERRING
Reviews.Content: Bought this piece of garbage 3 years ago, Black Friday sale. The fan had to be replaced due to overheating within 4 months. Not even a year later, same problem plus the battery was shot (not that it was any good anyway. 45 min battery life was the most I ever got from it unplugged.) I will admit, initially, I would leave the computer on the carpet a lot but never did it again once the fan was replaced the first time. This laptop is a fossil by today's standards anyways but if anyone happens to come across this....buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: Worst computer ever

Reviews.Content: This computer cause me problems like screen flicking in hd on youtube.Try booting windows xp will fail plus IT'S A SINGLE CORE COMPUTER DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS CRAP.
